mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customeruserrole as cur LEFT JOIN role on cur.roleID = role.roleID WHERE cur.customerUserID = #{customerUserID}

SELECT p.`privilegeID`, p.`name`, p.`description`, p.`type`, p.`category`, p.`status` FROM `roleprivilege` as rp LEFT JOIN privilege as p on p.privilegeID = rp.privilegeID WHERE rp.roleID = #{roleID};
